articles.title: Chinese President Xi Jinping Meets Choe Ryong Hae
articles.content:
Chinese President Xi Jinping Meets Choe Ryong Hae
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China, met with Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, on a visit to China as a special envoy of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK,  at the Great Hall of the People on Friday.
					Present there from the DPRK side were the party of the special envoy: KPA Col. Gen. Ri Yong Gil; Kim Song Nam, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee; Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs; KPA Lieut. Gen. Kim Su Gil; and Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China.
					
					Present from the Chinese side were Yang Jiechi, state councilor; Wang Jiarui, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and head of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee; Zhang Yesui, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs;  the deputy director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee; Liu Jieyi, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee; Yang Yanyi, assistant to the head of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee; and officials concerned.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae conveyed greetings sent by Kim Jong Un to Xi Jinping.
					
					Xi Jinping expressed deep thanks for this and asked Choe Ryong Hae to convey his cordial greetings to Kim Jong Un.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae courteously conveyed Kim Jong Un's personal letter to Xi Jinping.
					
					Xi Jinping expressed deep thanks once again to Kim Jong Un for dispatching Choe Ryong Hae as his special envoy and conveying his personal letter.
					
					Kim Jong Un in his personal letter underlined the need to carry forward and consolidate the traditional DPRK-China friendship provided and cultivated by the revolutionaries of the elder generation of the two countries, Xi Jinping said, noting that the Chinese party and government deem it very important to develop the Sino-DPRK friendly relations on a strategic level and from a long-term viewpoint and that it is the consistent policy of the Chinese party and government to inherit the tradition, face up to the future and strengthen cooperation.
					
					The Chinese party and government hope for expanding the friendly exchange and cooperation with the party and government of the DPRK, he noted.
					
					The Chinese party and government have consistently supported the building of a thriving socialist nation of Korean style, he said, wishing the DPRK success in developing the economy and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae said that the DPRK and the PRC are friendly neighbors linked by the same mountain and rivers and their friendship has a long history and tradition. It is the invariable stand of the party and government of the DPRK to boost the long-standing traditional friendship between the DPRK and China, he said.
					
					The armies and peoples of the two countries know well that the DPRK-China friendship associated with the devoted efforts of the revolutionaries of the elder generation of the two countries is a precious one which cannot be exchanged for anything, he said, expressing the belief that the traditional friendship would further flourish in the future under the particular care of the top leaders of the two parties and two countries.
					
					He expressed hope that the Chinese people would realize "the dream of China" and achieve bigger successes in accomplishing the socialist cause with Chinese characteristics under the leadership of the CPC with Xi Jinping as its general secretary.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Meets Fan Changlong
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Meets Fan Changlong
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA on a visit to China as a special envoy of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, met with Fan Changlong, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of China and vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the CPC, at the August 1 Building of the Chinese People's Liberation Army on Friday.
					Present there from the DPRK side were the party of the special envoy: KPA Col. Gen. Ri Yong Gil; Kim Song Nam, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee; Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs; KPA Lieut. Gen. Kim Su Gil; and Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, and the military attache of the DPRK embassy in Beijing.
					
					Present from the Chinese side were Wang Guanzhong, deputy chief of the General Staff of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, Liu Jieyi, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the CPC, Guan Youfei, director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Ministry of National Defense, and officials concerned.
					
					Fan Changlong warmly welcomed the special envoy's visit to China.
					
					He noted that the two armies and peoples forged the militant friendship, fighting shoulder to shoulder in the same trench.
					
					Saying that the special envoy's visit to China is of great significance in the development of the bilateral ties, he expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties, the two countries and the two armies would grow stronger on a new high stage.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae said that the friendship between the DPRK and China was sealed in blood in the hard-fought battlefields including the anti-Japanese war, the war for liberating Northeast China and the Fatherland Liberation War, adding that it is an issue of particular importance in defending socialism in the two countries to boost the exchange and cooperation between the two armies.
					
					He expressed the expectation that the two armies would play the role of a pioneer and vanguard in the development of the DPRK-China friendly ties in the future.
					
					Both sides exchanged views on the matters of boosting the friendly ties between the two armies.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Meets Liu Yunshan
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Meets Liu Yunshan
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, on a visit to China as a special envoy of the dear respected Kim Jong Un,  met with Liu Yunshan, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau and member of the Secretariat of the C.C., Communist Party of China (CPC), at the Great Hall of the People on Thursday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were the party of the special envoy KPA Col. Gen. Ri Yong Gil; Kim Song Nam, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee; Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs; and KPA Lieut. Gen. Kim Su Gil; and Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China.
					
					 Present from the Chinese side were Wang Jiarui, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and head of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee, Zhang Yesui, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs; Liu Jieyi, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee; Yang Yanyi, assistant to the head of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee; and other officials concerned.
					
					 Liu warmly welcomed the China visit by the special envoy of First Secretary Kim Jong Un, on behalf of the CPC Central Committee. 
					
					 He said the Chinese party and government deem it very important to steadily develop the China-DPRK friendly relations on a strategic level and from a long-term viewpoint. 
					
					 The China visit by the special envoy is of weighty significance as it is taking place at a time when the Sino-DPRK relations have entered a new era of carrying forward the tradition and future, Liu said, stressing the need to boost the bilateral relations of friendship, a precious treasure common to the peoples of the two countries, down through generations. 
					
					 The Chinese side hopes that the Sino-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation will comprehensively grow stronger in political, economic, cultural and other fields as required by the new era, Liu added. 
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae said he came to China as a special envoy of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, adding that it is the invariable stand of the WPK to consolidate and develop generation after generation the DPRK-China friendship associated with the devoted efforts made by the leaders of the elder generation of the two parties and countries. 
					
					 The DPRK will always advance hand in hand with the Chinese comrades to defend the socialist cause in the two countries and boost the friendship and solidarity between the two peoples, he noted, expressing hope that the CPC and the Chinese people would register greater successes in socialist construction with Chinese characteristics under the leadership of the CPC with Xi Jinping as its general secretary. 
					
					 Both sides exchanged views on the situation of the Korean Peninsula and issues of mutual concern.
					
					 At the end of the conversation Liu hosted a reception in honor of the special envoy and his party.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Special Envoy Flies Back from China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Special Envoy Flies Back from China
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, came back here by special plane Friday after visiting the People's Republic of China as a special envoy of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					Arriving together with the special envoy were his party: KPA Col. Gen. Ri Yong Gil; Kim Song Nam, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee; Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs; KPA Lieut. Gen. Kim Su Gil; and other officials concerned.
					
					They were greeted at the airport by Kim Kyok Sik, chief of the KPA General Staff, Kim Yong Il, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, KPA Col. Gen. Son Chol Ju, Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials concerned and Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					The special envoy and his party left Beijing Friday.
					
					They were seen off at the airport by Liu Jieyi, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and officials concerned and Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China.

articles.title: Lao Party Official Interviewed
articles.content:
Lao Party Official Interviewed
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Soukanh Mahalath, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, secretary of the Vientiane City Party Committee and mayor, was interviewed by KCNA before flying back home.
					Noting the objective of the delegation's visit was to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and the ties between Vientiane and Pyongyang, he said:
					
					The friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by Kaysone Phomvihane and President Kim Il Sung are developing on good terms day by day under the deep care of Choummaly Sayasone and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Our visit to the DPRK offered us an opportunity to learn good experience gained by it and make a resolve to apply it.
					
					It is a common obligation of the two countries to develop their long-standing friendly relations.
					
					We will do our best to boost them.
					
					I am sure that the bilateral friendly relations will last forever. While staying in the DPRK, we have witnessed the Korean people registering remarkable successes in various fields under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, he noted, and continued:
					
					Kim Jong Un set forth the strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force at the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					We fully support the line which serves as a landmark of the Korean people's victory.
					
					It is our belief that the Korean people will achieve steady progress under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					We are sure a final victory is in store for the Korean people.
					
					The Korean people's just cause will be successfully accomplished.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Fly Back
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Fly Back
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The delegation of Vientiane City of Laos led by Soukanh Mahalath, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, secretary of the Vientiane City Party Committee and mayor, and Jurgen Klimke, member of the Federal Parliament from the Christian Democratic Union of Germany, and his companion, flew back on Friday.

articles.title: Promising Sites for Developing Underground Resources Found
articles.content:
Promising Sites for Developing Underground Resources Found
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Geological survey teams of the DPRK have found promising sites for developing underground resources in recent years.
					They have confirmed scientific and comprehensive data for finding more sites for developing coal and ore mines and exploring for new ore deposits.
					
					The South Phyongan Provincial Prospecting Bureau is focusing efforts on prospecting coal deposits. Officials and other people of the Puksan Geological Survey Team and other units have given priority to geological survey and increased the survey speed, finding out rich coal deposits and securing sites for detailed prospecting of coal deposits.
					
					Members of the geological survey teams under the South Hwanghae and Kangwon provincial prospecting bureaus have made achievements in confirming areas rich in iron ore with a good prospect of development and their deposits.
					
					The Ryanggang and North Hamgyong provincial prospecting bureaus have reported signal successes in prospecting non-ferrous metallic and non-metallic resources. They have conducted preliminary prospecting of areas, developing promising ore deposits.
					
					The North Phyongan Provincial Prospecting Bureau has pushed forward prospecting of rare metal and rare earth element minerals abundant in the country, paving the way for building a leading ore mine.
					
					A prospecting operation is making rapid progress in Pyongyang and other parts of the country to find out and use underground water and geothermal resources rich in them.

articles.title: DPRK Strives for Environmental Protection
articles.content:
DPRK Strives for Environmental Protection
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has attached great importance to the protection of natural environment.
					The Cabinet, the State Planning Commission and provincial, city and county people's committees and other related institutions strive to provide equipment, materials and funds needed for environmental protection.
					
					Research institutes under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection have solved scientific and technological problems arising in this field.
					
					Sewage treatment plants in industrial and residential quarters have been built on a modern basis.
					
					Mines throughout the country have pushed ahead with reconstruction of settling reservoirs to thoroughly prevent the pollution of rivers, lakes and seas.
					
					Waste water disposal facilities are being re-furnished at ports, estuaries and vessels.
					
					A tree-planting campaign has been conducted on a nationwide scale along with activities to protect and propagate animals and plants.
					
					Meanwhile, 2.3 million hectares of land, including streets, residential quarters, parks and pleasure grounds, were covered with new species of turf throughout the country up till now.

articles.title: Reun Capsule, New Cerebration Invigorator
articles.content:
Reun Capsule, New Cerebration Invigorator
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Among the exhibits at the 16th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair (May 13-16) was Reun capsule, a new kind of cerebration invigorator, presented by the Jongsong Trading Company.
					The capsule is made of physiological activators, such as lecithin extracted from bean, ginkgo leaf extract and various kinds of vitamins.
					
					It is efficacious for easing mental stress and helpful to curing amnesia, insomnia, aphasia, dizziness and hand and foot aching. It is also good for fatty liver and liver cirrhosis.
					
					With no side effect, the capsule was granted with the DPRK patent right in September 2012.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Shifting Blame for Situation in KIZ onto DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Shifting Blame for KIZ Situation onto DPRK
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification on May 20 proposed a working contact between authorities for carrying out products and raw and other materials of the south Korean enterprises in the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ). He made a far-fetched assertion that "the pending issue is to minimize the losses of those enterprises but it is very unreasonable for the north to call for the settlement of the fundamental issue," sidestepping it.
					Minju Joson Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					This is nothing but a crafty trick to mislead the public opinion in a bid to cover up the crimes the puppet group committed by pushing the situation in KIZ to the present deplorable phase and divert businessmen and people's criticism of it to the DPRK.
					
					It is the ulterior intention of the puppet regime to bring KIZ to a total collapse and pass the buck for it to the DPRK.
					
					That is why the regime is working hard to create impression that it is interested in dialogue, talking about "the minimization of the losses of the south Korean enterprises", working talks and working contact. 
					
					In case the DPRK responds to working talks and contact, the regime seeks to use them for escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					The minister of Unification of south Korea on May 21 let loose a spate of reckless remarks before lawmakers from opposition parties. He asserted: South Korea can hear about a fundamental issue but cannot accept it. It is not in a position to have dialogue, complying even with the demand for making an apology for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the north.
					
					This is a revelation of its intention to maintain a status quo without finding a settlement of the fundamental issue, continue staging north-targeted war drills together with the U.S. behind the curtain of "dialogue" and persist in the criminal acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					The puppet group is sadly mistaken if it calculates its trick will work on the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for More Dynamic Struggle for Democracy against Fascism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for More Dynamic Struggle for Democracy against Fascism
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The prevailing situation calls on people from all walks of life in south Korea to turn out as one in the struggle to resolutely foil the moves for reviving dictatorship and put an end to the fascist rule by carrying forward the spirit displayed by the Kwangju resistance fighters.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					The present ruling quarters in south Korea are misinterpreting the historical significance of the Kwangju Popular Uprising and the spirit of democracy and working hard to dampen it in an open bid to revive dictatorship and embellish it, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					Something astonishing is happening in south Korea these days. Ultra-right conservatives malignantly defamed the uprising as a "riot of mobs in which a special unit of the north was involved" and disallowed the singing of the song "March for the Love" reflecting the soul of martyrs.
					
					It was well known that the present chief executive of south Korea began her politics to reinstate the "yusin" dictator. As a matter of fact, the chief of Chongwadae faithfully carried forward the ruling method of the "yusin" dictator. She appointed remnants of the "yusin" junta and their descendants as bosses of the Intelligence Service, prosecution and other repressive machines.
					
					Such reckless scenario finds a vivid expression in the fact that the puppet ruling quarters are working hard to enact a "legislation" on forcibly dissolving pro-reunification movement organizations while undisguisedly blustering that "security at present is more serious than that in the Cold War era in the 1950s" and "it is necessary to suppress the freedom of expression under this situation."
					
					The historical lesson taught by the uprising teaches independence, democracy and reunification desired by the south Korean people never come of themselves but they can be achieved only through mass actions for democracy against fascism.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Chongryon to Uphold Kim Jong Il's Feats
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Chongryon to Uphold Kim Jong Il's Feats
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 18th anniversary of historic letter "On Developing the Movement of Koreans in Japan onto a New High Stage" sent by leader Kim Jong Il to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of Chongryon.
					The letter, published on May 24, Juche 84 (1995), comprehensively deals with the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed in the history of the movement of Koreans in Japan and specifies the basic orientation of the work of  Chongryon and its main tasks and ways.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined article says the letter is an important work which clearly indicates the path of the movement of Koreans in Japan which entered a new phase of its development.
					
					Kim Jong Il in his letter advanced the issue of defending the democratic national rights and interests of compatriots, developing national education and preserving the national character, the issue of defending the socialist homeland and making tangible contributions to its prosperity, the issue of waging a more dynamic movement for national reunification and activating the external information service and activities in the idea of independence, peace and friendship as the main tasks to be always held fast to in the patriotic activities of Chongryon. The letter specified the issue of consolidating Chongryon organizationally and ideologically and the issue of improving work method and work style of Chongryon officials and ways to do so.
					
					The officials of Chongryon have registered many achievements in their dynamic efforts to step up the movement of Koreans in Japan, full of conviction and true to the line and policies set forth by Kim Jong Il in his letter, the article says.
					
					The article calls upon all the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan to uphold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Juche-based idea of the movement of overseas compatriots and their feats as immovable guidelines and eternal cornerstone of the movement of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket under Fire
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, an anti-DPRK "human rights" farce was staged in Seoul under the signboard of international meeting. Ryu Kil Jae, south Korean puppet minister of Unification, hosting the farce, revealed his sinister intention to step up the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket, crying out for "working out a key plan" for "improvement of human rights in the north" and "putting spurs to the efforts to institute a law on human rights in the north." He even urged the attendants to "respond" to the efforts to "improve the human rights record in the north" and cooperate in the bid to realize "confidence-building process".
					Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					This is nothing but shameless sophism of a confrontation maniac steeped in inveterate repugnance and hostility towards the DPRK to the marrow of his bones.
					
					The south Korean puppet regime's talk about "human rights" issue in the DPRK is nothing but an unbearable insult to the high dignity of Songun Korea and a politically-motivated unpardonable provocation.
					
					It is, at the same time, a cynical ploy to build up public opinion about "human rights problem in the north," a fiction, and make it an established fact in a bid to tarnish the dignified image of the DPRK and fan up an atmosphere of confrontation with it at home and abroad.
					
					What Ryu uttered is an open declaration of the puppet regime's scenario to realize its design for achieving the "unification of social systems" by escalating the all-out confrontation with the DPRK through a nuclear racket and "human rights" campaign. 
					
					The present ruling forces of south Korea are now working hard to hide their true colors as confrontation maniacs with rhetoric about "confidence-building process."
					
					The puppet regime is sadly mistaken if it thinks it can realize its wild ambition to bring about a "change" in the DPRK and achieve an ambition for "unification of social systems" with such cheap charade. 
					
					It had better stop such rash act as trying to sweep the sea with a broom and put its poor human rights record under control.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive's Anti-DPRK Remarks Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive's Anti-DPRK Remarks Flayed
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA on Friday:
					The present chief executive of south Korea unhesitatingly let loose such malignant invectives as daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, fully revealing her true colors as a confrontation maniac.
					
					When meeting the director of the U.S. Centre for Strategic and International Studies in Seoul on Thursday, the chief executive hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, blustering that it is "playing a gamble to escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula." Finding fault with the DPRK's new line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force, she termed it "an attempt at a new gamble" and "it would never succeed."
					
					It was the height of rude behavior to bring the north-south relations to a total collapse that she made such reckless remarks malignantly defaming the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its new line even before 100 days from her coming to power.
					
					It was the chief of Chongwadae who virulently slandered the DPRK's new line, stunning even her American master, not content with letting loose a whole string of vituperation hurting fellow countrymen during her trip to the U.S.
					
					All people are surprised by a spate of invectives let loose by her, putting her predecessor into the shade.
					
					Her reckless remarks brought to light the deceptive nature of the "confidence" touted by her and it has become clear that she is steeped in the ulterior intention to escalate the confrontation.
					
					What she uttered is nothing but a reckless provocation made by a mentally deranged person bereft of reason and face.
					
					In fact, the south Korean puppet group seems to have lost senses, being extremely nervous over domestic and foreign criticism resulting from serious political crisis, present catastrophic north-south relations and the changing situation in the vicinity of the peninsula.
					
					She is much upset by the failure of the cooperation in the anti-DPRK campaign for which she has made enormous efforts. Her rigmarole is, therefore, a revelation of her attempt to bar the situation from leading to detente, turn the people's mindset favorable to her and escalate tension in a bid to persist in the moves for confrontation and war. 
					
					People of all social standings and media of south Korea are deeply concerned over the adverse impact her provocative remarks will have on the situation on the Korean Peninsula and the north-south relations.
					
					It is none other than the chief executive of south Korea who is playing a dangerous gamble for a nuclear war together with outside forces and going mad with the moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					These days she never opens mouth without slandering the DPRK's new line. This only brings shame to herself as it reveals her ignorance.
					
					It only sparks off derision and disillusion that the present chief executive is talking about what she called  "confidence-building," without knowing how to observe elementary etiquette and morality towards the other party.
					
					The people of the DPRK will never pardon anyone hurting the dignity of its supreme leadership.
					
					There is a limit to their patience and self-restraint.
					
					The chief executive would be well advised to behave herself, bearing in mind that in case she continues hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK with such reckless remarks, she will face a deadlier retaliation than what traitor Lee Myung Bak did.

articles.title: DPRK Lauded by Korean in U.S.
articles.content:
DPRK Lauded by Korean in U.S.
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The editor of Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on May 17 expressed impressions of his visit to the DPRK.
					Saying all the service personnel and people in the homeland are single-mindedly united around the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, the editor spoke highly of their matchless respect and reverence for him.
					
					Referring to the line on simultaneously advancing economic construction and the building of nuclear force set forth at the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, he said the DPRK is fully confident of its ability to thwart any provocation by the imperialists as it has modern military forces.
					
					Noting modern buildings including apartment houses and service centers have been recently built in Pyongyang and various other parts, he said:
					
					"Keep Your Feet Firmly Planted on This Land and Look Out over the World!", an aphorism of leader Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, is in active embodiment in the homeland.
					
					Amid screwed-up confrontation with the U.S., the youth and students in the homeland said that they are working hard while waiting for the order of the Marshal.
					
					The scholarly performance of the students is improving on a daily basis and many schoolchildren's palaces and halls were built throughout the country to contribute to the improvement of their artistic aptitudes.
					
					The editor said he would be active in informing the compatriots of the situation of the homeland.

articles.title: U.S. Moves for Aggression Slammed
articles.content:
U.S. Moves for Aggression Slammed
 Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- British organizations in a joint statement on May 7 denounced the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces for moving to provoke a war against the DPRK. They included the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association.
					 The statement said:
					
					 As soon as Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises ended, the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers staged a shelling drill targeting the DPRK on Paekryong and Yonphyong islands in the West Sea of Korea from May 5 and planned a large joint naval war drill.
					
					 This is an unpardonable provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has kept to the road of the Songun revolution under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and it is neither browbeaten nor yield to threat by the enemies.
					
					 The DPRK is a country of Songun equipped with powerful means for defence.
					
					 The Korean People's Army under the invincible leadership of Kim Jong Un will resolutely foil the U.S. reckless moves to ignite a war.

articles.title: U.S. Attempt to Deploy Ultra-Modern Drones under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Attempt to Develop Ultra-Modern Drones under Fire
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. conducted a test flight of fighter jet-size X-47B drone by letting it take off from an aircraft carrier in the waters off Virginia State, a debut flying of drone from a flat-top. Prior to this, the U.S. Air Force conducted a test flight of an ultra super-sonic drone capable of striking any targets on earth in the waters off the southern region of California State.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined commentary observes in this regard:
					
					Such test flights indicate that the U.S. is scheming to expand the drone war on a world-wide scale by developing and deploying ultra-modern drones.
					
					The U.S. is getting frantic in developing and deploying latest war hardware by spending a fabulous amount of money although it is suffering economic depression. Lurking behind this is its ulterior design to win an unchallenged military edge in the international arena.
					
					Although much water has flown under the bridge, the ambition of the U.S. to dominate the world by force remains unchanged.
					
					The present U.S. administration is expanding the scale of its war of aggression, being hell-bent on threat and blackmail against other countries by use of latest war hardware, an evermore undisguised revelation of its ambition for hegemony.
					
					It is an ulterior calculation of the U.S. that it can dominate the world if it becomes capable of neutralizing the attack from other countries and dealing critical blows at them. Its desperate establishment of missile defence systems is just aimed to weaken the offensive capabilities of big powers and increase its attack capabilities.
					
					Peace and arms buildup can never go together.
					
					The U.S. is oft-repeating about "peace and guarantee of security" but it is nothing but rhetoric to conceal its crimes of harassing the peace. With no sleight of hand can the U.S. hide its crimes and true colors as a main architect stirring up international arms race and wrecking the world peace and security.

articles.title: Osaka Mayor's Remarks of Negating Japan's Past Crime Refuted
articles.content:
Osaka Mayor's Remarks of Negating Japan's Past Crime Refuted
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- More than 100 Korean counsels from across Japan accused Osaka Mayor Hashimoto, an ultra-rightist, of his remarks negating the sexual slavery crime of the past Imperial Japanese Army on May 17, according to the south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News.
					They said the mayor in his remarks falsified the truth about the past of Japan, which committed sexual slavery crime for the imperial army in a fraudulent and violent way.
					
					The imperial army, for confidentiality and other military purposes, used even teenage girls, they noted.
					
					Saying the remarks of Hashimoto, who is also a counsel, are against the counsel's obligation of advocating human rights, they said they would urge the Japan Federation of Bar Associations to punish him for delinquency.
					
					They thrust a statement issued in demand of the apology of Hashimoto to the above-said federation.

articles.title: Russian Paper Denounces U.S. War Drill
articles.content:
Russian Paper Denounces U.S. War Drill
Pyongyang, May 24 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Tribuna on May 16 carried a commentary denouncing the frantic large-scale war drill for aggression staged by the U.S. against the DPRK. 
					The commentary said that the U.S. introduced the super-large nuclear-powered carrier Nimitz task group into south Korea to stage a joint naval war drill with the south Korean puppet forces. 
					
					It went on:
					
					Warships and strategic bombers of the U.S. staged nuclear strike drills on the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity for nearly three months recently. 
					
					It is out of argument that the U.S. has denied the DPRK's proposal for ending the ceasefire. 
					
					However, media of the West depict the U.S. as "peace keeper" and the DPRK, which has never attacked others, as "bellicose country."
					
					Pyongyang declared that it would not use nukes for military purposes if the U.S. threats are removed and the DPRK-U.S. relations are settled. But Washington has denied this.
					
					The DPRK knows well about the situation in Libya and regards it as a suicidal act to abandon nuclear nukes. It is also aware that the mechanism for ensuring independent rights of sovereign states does not work in the international arena. 
					
					Recalling that a U.S. carrier task group took part in the Iraqi war, the commentary said:
					
					The DPRK cannot see whether the Nimitz task group would wage the military drill and whether the drill will turn to an actual war. 
					
					Pyongyang has coldly responded with words only, controlling itself. 
					
					Why does the West regard all the statements and acts of the DPRK as threats whereas the acts of the U.S. and its allies as peaceful and civilized ones?
					
					The reason for blaming the situation on the Korean Peninsula on the DPRK is all the same, i.e. the "emperor" rules the world and most of countries curry favor with it.
					
					The world should not forget a historical lesson of the Second World War in which connivance at Hitler brought about worldwide disasters.

articles.title: Xi Jinping se reune con Choe Ryong Hae
articles.content:
Xi Jinping se reune con Choe Ryong Hae
Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ACNC) -- Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China se reunio el dia 24 en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo con el vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, de visita en la RPCh en calidad de enviado especial del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, primer Secretario General del PTC y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana los acompanantes de Choe: el coronel general del EPC, Ri Yong Gil, el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Song Nam, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Kim Hyong Jun, el teniente general del EPC, Kim Su Gil, y el embajador coreano en China, Ji Jae Ryong y por la china, el consejero de Estado, Yang Jiechi, el vicepresidente del Comite Nacional de la Conferencia Consultiva Politica del Pueblo Chino y jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, Wang Jiarui, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Zhang Yesui, el subdirector de la Oficina General del CC del PCCh, el subjefe de Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, Liu Jieyi, el asistente al jefe de este departamento, Yang Yanyi y otros funcionarios.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae transmitio a Xi Jinping el saludo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC y Primer Presidente del CDN de la RPDC.
					
					Xi Jinping expreso profundo agradecimiento al respecto y rogo a Choe que transmita su saludo al Mariscal.
					
					El enviado especial entrego cortesmente a Xi Jinping la carta personal del Mariscal.
					
					Xi Jinping volvio a expresar agradecimiento por haber hecho que Kim Jong Un haya enviado a Choe Ryong Hae como su enviado especial y trasladado tal carta.
					
					El mandatario chino dijo que el Primer Secretario Kim Jong Un destaco en su misiva la necesidad de heredar, consolidar y desarrollar la tradicional amistad Corea-China preparada y florecida por los revolucionarios de la veterana generacion y subrayo que el partido y gobierno de China aprecian mucho el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad China-Corea a las alturas estrategicas y desde las perspectivas de largo alcance.
					
					Agrego que la continuacion de tradicion, la aspiracion al futuro y el fortalecimiento de cooperacion constituyen una orientacion invariable del partido y gobierno chinos.
					
					Recalco que el partido y gobierno de China esperan la ampliacion del intercambio y cooperacion junto con el partido y gobierno de Corea.
					
					El partido y gobierno de China apoyan siempre la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista a estilo coreano, afirmo y deseo a Corea exitos en el desarrollo economico y la mejora de vida del pueblo.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae apunto que Corea y China son amistosos vecinos lindantes con los montes y rios y la amistad Corea-China tiene una larga historia y tradicion e hizo hincapie en que la invariable posicion del partido y gobierno de Corea es fortalecer y desarrollar la tradicional amistad Corea-China que prolongaba pasando siglos y decadas.
					
					Los ejercitos y pueblos de los dos paises conocen muy bien que es muy preciosa la amistad Corea-China en que estan impregnados los esfuerzos y energias de los revolucionarios de generacion veterana de ambos paises, acoto y expreso la conviccion de que florecera plenamente la tradicional amistad Corea-China bajo la atencion peculiar de los maximos dirigentes de los dos partidos y dos paises.
					
					Deseo al pueblo chino mayores exitos en la realizacion del "sueno de China" y en el cumplimiento de la causa socialista con particularidades chinas bajo la direccion del PCCh encabezado por el Secretario General Xi Jinping.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae se reune con Fan Changlong
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae se reune con Fan Changlong
Pyongyang, 25 de mayo (ACNC) -- El vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, de visita en China en calidad del enviado especial del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, se reunio el dia 24 en el Edificio Primero de Agosto del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China (EPLCh) con Fan Changlong, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central y vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central, del Partido Comunista de China.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana, los acompanantes de Choe: el coronel general del EPC, Ri Yong Gil, el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim  Song Nam, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Kim Hyong Jun, el teniente general del EPC, Kim Su Gil, y el embajador coreano en China, Ji Jae Ryong y por la china, el subjefe del Estado Mayor General del EPLCh, Wang Guanzhong, el subjefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, Liu Jieyi, el director de la Oficina de Asuntos Exteriores del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional, Guan Youfei y otros funcionarios.
					
					El vicepresidente Fan Changlong, dio una calurosa bienvenida a la visita a China del enviado especial.
					
					El senalo que los militares y civiles de ambos paises enlazaron la amistad combativa luchando hombro a hombro en una misma trinchera.
					
					La presente visita del enviado especial tiene un gran significado en el desarrollo de relaciones bilaterales, asevero y expuso la conviccion de que con motivo de esta oportunidad se intensificaran y se desarrollaran a una etapa mas alta las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos, dos paises y dos ejercitos.
					
					El enviado especial Choe dijo que la amistad Corea-China fue establecida con sangre en la guerra antijaponesa, la guerra de liberacion de la region noreste de China, la de liberacion de la patria y otros campos de combates enconados y agrego que fortalecer el intercambio y la cooperacion entre los ejercitos de ambos paises sirve de especial importancia en defender el socialismo de los dos paises.
					
					Manifesto la esperanza de que en el futuro los ejercitos de los dos paises desempenen el papel de explorador y precursor en el desarrollo de relaciones de amistad Corea-China.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron sus opiniones sobre los asuntos para intensificar y desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad entre los  ejercitos de ambos paises.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae se reune con Liu Yunshan
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae se reune con Liu Yunshan
Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ACNC) -- El vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, de visita en la Republica Popular China en calidad de enviado especial del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, se reunio la vispera en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo con Liu Yunshan, miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico y del Secretariado del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China.
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion por la parte coreana los acompanantes de Choe como el coronel general del EPC, Ri Yong Gil, el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Song Nam, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Kim Hyong Jun, el teniente general del EPC, Kim Su Gil, y el embajador coreano en China, Ji Jae Ryong y por la china el vicepresidente del Comite Nacional de la Conferencia Consultiva Politica del Pueblo Chino y jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Wang Jiarui, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Zhang Yesui,  el subjefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del PCCh, Liu Jieyi, el asistente del jefe del mismo departamento, Yang Yanyi, y otros funcionarios.
					
					En representacion del CC del PCCh, Liu dio calida bienvenida a la visita a China del enviado especial enviado por el Primer Secretario Kim Jong Un.
					
					Senalo que el partido y gobierno chinos aprecian mucho en todo el tiempo el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad China-Corea a las alturas estrategicas y desde las perspectivas de largo alcance. 
					
					La presente visita del enviado especial resulta muy importante porque se realiza en el nuevo tiempo en que las relaciones bilaterales continuan sus tradiciones y futuro, dijo y destaco la necesidad de intensificar y desarrollar generacion tras generacion la amistad China-Corea, patrimonio valioso comun de los pueblos de ambos paises.
					
					Anadio que la parte china espera que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion China-Corea se amplien y se desarrollen integralmente, conforme a la demanda de la nueva epoca, en varios dominios como politica, economia, cultura, etc.
					
					Choe dijo que visita a China en calidad de enviado especial del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y ratifico la invariable posicion del PTC de consolidar y desarrollar de generacion en generacion la amistad Corea-China en que estan grabados los ingentes esfuerzos mentales y fisicos de los dirigentes de generacion veterana de ambos partidos y paises.
					
					Apunto que marcharia siempre estrechando la mano con los companeros chinos para defender la causa socialista en los dos paises, consolidar y desarrollar la amistad y solidaridad de los pueblos coreano y chino.
					
					Deseo que el partido y pueblo chinos logren mayores exitos en la construccion del socialismo con particularidades chinas bajo la orientacion del PCCh encabezado por el Secretario General Xi Jinping.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron criterios sobre la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y otros temas de interes mutuo.
					
					Terminado el dialogo, Liu ofrecio un banquete en honor del enviado especial y su comitiva.

articles.title: Regresa a Pyongyang enviado especial de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Regresa a Pyongyang enviado especial de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ACNC) -- El vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, regreso el dia 24 por avion especial a esta capital tras cumplir su visita a la Republica Popular China como enviado especial del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC.
					Volvieron tambien el coronel general del EPC, Ri Yong Gil, el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Song Nam, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Kim Hyong Jun, el teniente general del EPC, Kim Su Gil, y otros funcionarios. 
					
					Los acogieron en la terminal aerea el jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Kim Kyok Sik, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Il, el coronel general del EPC, Son Chol Ju, el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Yong Chol, el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Pak Kil Yon, y otros funcionarios, asi como el embajador chino en Corea, Liu Hongcai.
					
					Este dia, el enviado especial y su comitiva partieron de Beijing. 
					
					Ellos fueron despedidos en el aeropuerto por el subjefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Liu Jieyi, y otros funcionarios chinos y el embajador coreano en China, Ji Jae Ryong.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia difamacion anti- RPDC de autoridad surcoreana
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia difamacion anti- RPDC de autoridad surcoreana
Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada el dia 24 por la ACNC en relacion con que la actual autoridad del Sur de Corea difamo la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) le respondio como sigue:
					En estos dias, la actual gobernante del Sur de Corea insulta atrevidamente la maxima dignidad de la RPDC exponiendo mas abiertamente su naturaleza conflictiva.
					
					El dia 23, ella se reunio con el jefe del Centro Norteamericano para los Estudios Estrategicos e Internacionales, de visita en el Sur de Corea, ocasion en la cual ofendio directamente la maxima dignidad de la RPDC diciendo que "esta hace juego que agudiza la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana". Para colmo, censuro sin prudencia nuestra linea de desarrollo paralelo como intencion de nuevo juego irrealizable.
					
					Antes de 100 dias de su mandato en el poder la gobernante del Sur de Corea deshonro directamente nuestra maxima dignidad y linea de la politica, lo cual es un apogeo de la insolencia para fracasar totalmente las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Durante su reciente visita a EE.UU., la duena de Chongwadae lanzo las injurias de toda indole para difamar a sus connacionales y criticar nuestra linea de desarrollo paralelo, lo que asombro hasta a su amo gringo.
					
					Todo el mundo se quedo muy consternado ante sus sucesivas maldiciones mas venenosas que los predecesores.
					
					Con sus imprudentes locuras la autoridad surcoreana puso al desnudo la naturaleza enganosa de su palabra "confianza" y que ella tiene solo la intencion conflictiva.
					
					Sus peroratas no pasan de ser la provocacion de psicopata enloquecida en la confrontacion y carente de juicio y honra.
					
					Parece que la banda titere del Sur de Corea esta muy nerviosa por critica de la opinion publica cada dia mas alta en cuanto a la severa crisis politica interior, las actuales relaciones catastroficas entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea, el peor estado de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong, el cambio de la situacion del contorno y otros.
					
					Tales maldiciones persiguen impedir la corriente de la situacion a la fase de alivio, calmar la opinion publica y exacerbar la situacion a fin de recurrir de continuo a la confrontacion y las maniobras de guerra.
					
					Los habitantes de distintos estratos y los medios de prensa del Sur de Corea expresan gran preocupacion por las consecuencias que se emanen de las locuras provocativas de la actual autoridad surcoreana.
					
					La autoridad surcoreana es precisamente el autor principal que junto con las fuerzas foraneas juega con la peligrosa guerra nuclear y recurre locamente a la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Ella suele denigrar nuestra linea de desarrollo paralelo poniendo al desnudo su ignorancia.
					
					La supuesta "confianza" de que habla ella sin saber conservar la elemental obligacion moral sobre la contraparte, causa solo la ironia y desilusion.
					
					No perdonaremos jamas a quien ofende nuestra maxima dignidad.
					
					Nuestra paciencia y autocontrol tiene su limite.
					
					La autoridad surcoreana debe actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de que si sigue ofendiendo nuestra maxima dignidad, sufrira la represalia mas despiadada que el traidor Lee Myung Bak.

articles.title: Politico lao apoya causa de pueblo coreano
articles.content:
Politico lao apoya causa de pueblo coreano
Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ACNC) -- Soukanh Mahalath, secretario del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao, secretario del comite de esta organizacion en la ciudad de Vientiane y alcalde de la misma urbe, quien realizo una visita a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, concedio el dia 23 una entrevista con la ACNC antes de regresar a su pais. 
					Dijo que realizo visita a la RRPD para estrechar los lazos de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises y entre Vientiane y Pyongyang.
					
					Destaco que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises preparadas por Kaysone Phomvihane y el Presidente Kim Il Sung se desarrollan cada dia mas favorablemente bajo la profunda atencion de los camaradas Choummaly Sayasone y Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Subrayo que a traves de esta visita adquirio excelentes experiencias de la RPDC y tomo la decision de materializarlas y continuo.
					
					Desarrollar las relaciones de amistad de larga historia entre Laos y Corea es la tarea comun.
					
					Haremos todos los esfuerzos por el respecto. 
					
					Estoy convencido de que seran eternas las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises. 
					
					Durante mi estancia en la RPDC, he visto  relevantes exitos que alcanza el pueblo coreano en varios dominios bajo la sabia guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					El Mariscal presento en el pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea la linea estrategica de desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					Apoyamos enteramente esta linea que sirve de jalon de victoria del pueblo coreano. 
					
					Estamos seguros de que el pueblo coreano alcanzara incesante avance bajo la guia del Mariscal. 
					
					La victoria final es del pueblo coreano. 
					
					Se realizara satisfactoriamente la justa causa del pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Asegurados campos de reserva de recursos subterraneos
articles.content:
Asegurados campos de reserva de recursos subterraneos
Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ACNC) -- En los ultimos anos fueron descubiertos en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea nuevos campos de reserva de recursos subterraneos.
					Los cuerpos de prospeccion geologica de todas las localidades comprobaron los datos cientificos y sintetizados necesarios a descubrir mas los campos de reserva  de carbon y minerales.
					
					La Direccion de Prospeccion de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur concentra sus fuerzas en la exploracion de recursos carboniferos. Los funcionarios y exploradores del Cuerpo de Prospeccion Geologica Puksan y otras unidades descubrieron el gran yacimiento de carbon y aseguraron otro terreno para la prospeccion detallada de carbon al anteponer el analisis geologico y acelerar la exploracion. 
					
					Los exploradores adscritos a las direcciones de prospeccion de las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur y Kangwon obtienen resultados en determinar los campos y la cantidad de yacimiento de minerales de hierro con excelente perspectiva de la excavacion.
					
					Las otras de las provincias de Ryanggang y de Hamgyong del Norte registran innovaciones en la prospeccion de recursos de metal no ferroso, metaloide, etc.
					
					Desarrollaron la cuenca de recursos minerales con buena perspectiva al seleccionar correctamente la zona del objeto y realizar la exploracion prevista.
					
					La otra de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, que impulsa con dinamismo la exploracion sobre los recursos de metales raros y lantanidos que abundan en el pais, preparo la garantia para levantar una mina prominente.
					
					Se promueve activamente en la ciudad de Pyongyang y otras localidades del pais la labor por explorar y utilizar los abundantes recursos geotermicos y de aguas subterraneas.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela intencion de autoridades surcoreanas de imputar a RPDC responsabilidad de ZIK
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela intencion de autoridades surcoreanas de imputar a RPDC responsabilidad de ZIK
Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ACNC) -- El dia 20, el vocero del Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea propuso el contacto de trabajo entre las autoridades de ambas partes coreanas para la salida de productos y materias primas de las empresas surcoreanas asentadas en la Zona Industrial de Kaesong, diciendo que el "problema inminente es minimizar las perdidas de esas empresas" y "es muy injusta la insistencia del Norte de Corea que demanda la solucion del problema fundamental despreciando aquel tema".
					Esto es una artimana para enganar la opinion publica y eludir la culpabilidad de haber causado el actual estado de la ZIK y dirigir a la RPDC la mirada de odio de empresarios y habitantes clavada ahora en las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido el dia 24 y continua:
					
					La intencion de los titeres surcoreanos es destruir totalmente la ZIK e imputar la responsabilidad a la RPDC.
					
					Por eso, los titeres hablan de la "disminucion de las perdidas de las empresas asentadas en la ZIK", el dialogo de expertos, el contacto de trabajo y otros, como si tuvieran interes en las negociaciones.
					
					Si la RPDC acepta el dialogo y el contacto de expertos, los titeres van a malemplearlos en la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					El dia 21, el ministro surcoreano de Unificacion dijo en el encuentro con los parlamentarios de partidos opositores que "puede escuchar el problema fundamental, pero no puede aceptarlo" y "no puede realizar el dialogo aceptando la demanda (del Norte) de pedir disculpas por haber ofendido la maxima dignidad".
					
					Esto significa que ellos quieren mantener el actual estado sin revolver el problema fundamental, librar junto con Estados Unidos los ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la RPDC detras de la cortina de "dialogo" y continuar ofendiendo la maxima dignidad de ella.
					
					Estarian muy equivocados si los titeres surcoreanos piensan en que la RPDC se dejara enganar por la trama de ellos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun aboga por avivar llamas de lucha por democracia antifascista en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun aboga por avivar llamas de lucha por democracia antifascista en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual insertado hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que la realidad de hoy demanda que los habitantes surcoreanos de diversos estratos se movilicen en la lucha contra la resucitacion de dictadura y dar punto final a la tirania al mantener el espiritu de lucha de los insurrectos de Kwangju, y prosigue:
					Las actuales fuerzas gobernantes del Sur de Corea tratan de reproducir y encomian la dictadura restando el significado historico y el espiritu de democratizacion del Levantamiento Popular de Kwangju.
					
					En estos dias, las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas del Sur de Corea estan insultando el citado levantamiento como "tumulto de los insurgentes en que intervino el comando norcoreano" y prohiben una cancion que transmite el espiritu de los martires.
					
					Ya es conocido por todo el mundo que la actual gobernante comenzo la carrera de politica para recuperar el honor del dictador de "Yusin". En realidad, imita el modo de gobernar del dictador de "Yusin" y nombra a los restos de "Yusin" y sus descendientes en los puestos del Servicio de Inteligencia, la fiscalia y otras unidades de represion.
					
					Para reproducir la dictadura de "Yusin", las fuerzas titeres en el poder hablan abiertamente que la "seguridad de hoy corre mas riesgo que el periodo de guerra fria de la decada de los 50" y "hay que restringir la libertad de expresion bajo tal circunstancia" y maniobran para fabricar la "ley" que permita descomponer por la fuerza las entidades del movimiento por reunificacion.
					
					El Levantamiento Popular de Kwangju dejo una leccion historica de que la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion, deseadas tanto por los habitantes surcoreanos, se logran mediante la lucha masiva para la democratizacion antifascista.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena intencion de EE.UU para desarrollar drones de nuevo tipo
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena intencion de EE.UU para desarrollar drones de nuevo tipo
Pyongyang, 24 de mayo (ACNC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos realizo en el mar frente al Estado de Virgina un ensayo de despegue del nuevo drones X-47B, cuyo tamano es igual a un caza,  en el portaaviones nuclear. Con anterioridad, las fuerzas aereas norteamericanas hicieron en el mar frente a la zona meridional del estado de California el otro experimental de drones hipersonico capaz de atacar cualesquier zonas del globo terraqueo.
					En un comentario individual insertado hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun puntualiza que tal hecho insinua que el imperio yanqui intenta ampliar a la esfera mundial la guerra de drones al desarrollar y emplazar los de ultimo modelo, y prosigue:
					
					Aunque sufre la crisis economica, el imperio yanqui se enfrasca para desarrollar y ubicar nuevos armamentos invirtiendo fabulosos fondos para tomar la absoluta superioridad militar en  escena internacional.
					
					Aunque se cambio la epoca, no se cambio la ambicion de los yanquis de tomar la hegemonia mundial con las fuerzas. 
					
					La actual administracion norteamericana, con tal ambicion hegemonica cada dia mas abierta, recurre al chantaje y amplifica la guerra de agresion contra otros paises aprovechando los pertrechos de nuevos tipos. Calcula taimadamente que es posible tomar el mundo si cuenta con la capacidad de neutralizar la ofensiva de otros paises y darles el ataque mortal. Para ese fin, se entrega a estructurar el sistema antimisiles para debilitar el poder ofensivo de varias potencias y elevar el suyo.
					
					Son incompatibles la paz y el aumento armamentista.
					
					EE.UU. suele hablar de la "la paz y la seguridad", lo cual no pasa de ser un chisme para encubrir sus actos de destruccion de la paz. Con cualesquier artimanas intrigantes, el imperio yanqui no podra encubrir el crimen y la naturaleza como responsable que fomenta la carrera armamentista internacional y destruye la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
